text:
Hello team!
We have a very good opportunity.
From HQ team they have given us 10 seats for a training that they will offer in Barcelona on Monday, October 14th (full day training).
The training/workshop is: â€œInteraction Styleâ€, based on MBTI, with Joachim Kohlbacher.
What is â€œInteraction Styleâ€, based on MBTI:
Â§
It derives from communication theory
Â§
It is the merge of psycho physiological energy
Â§
It shows â€œHowâ€ we interact with others to achieve results, highly situational
Â§
We have an innate preference for one of four styles
Â§
It is a set of unconscious drives
Â§
Interaction Style gives an indicator of our role in a group
At the end of this program, participants will have:
Â·
Experienced a comprehensive self-assessment on Interaction Style
Â·
Recognize the preferences related to each Interaction Style and how to observe clues for these preferences
Â·
Recognize diversity of participants and what learning methods/styles appeal to individual Interaction Style
Â·
Identified the inherent strengths and challenges they might face in their role based on Interaction Style.
Â·
Established an action plan to apply these skills and techniques in everyday Training situations.
If you are interested in attending, please reply to this email.
Deadline: Friday at 10h.
Thank you & Happy learning! ğŸ˜Š
